aiutd.midnightconfig.title: Am I Up To Date Config
aiutd.midnightconfig.menuAlert.tooltip: Toggles display of the main menu update notification
aiutd.midnightconfig.chatAlert.tooltip: Toggles display of the update notice in chat when loading into a world
aiutd.midnightconfig.localVersion.toolti: Enter the local version of the modpack here
aiutd.midnightconfig.versionAPI.tooltip: Replace <id> with the modpack ID found on your Modrinth projects page
aiutd.midnightconfig.changelogLink.toolt: Replace <modpack URL> with the URL you've set for the pack
aiutd.midnightconfig.useModpackName.tool: Set the chat message to display a custom name for your modpack, wont display unless Modpack Name is set
aiutd.midnightconfig.useCustomMessage.to: Set the chat message to display a custom message, overrides Modpack Name
aiutd.midnightconfig.customMessage.toolt: Set the custom chat message to display
aiutd.midnightconfig.linkChangelog.toolt: Display a link to the changelog
